author: Reuters Editorial
title: Metair Expects FY 2017 HEPS Between 276 And 285 Cents Per Share
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Metair Investments Ltd:
* EXPECTS FY 2017 ‍HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE TO BE BETWEEN 20.6% AND 24.6% HIGHER (BETWEEN 276 CENTS AND 285 CENTS PER SHARE) THAN 229 CENTS PER SHARE​
* EXPECTS FY 2017 EPS TO BE BETWEEN 21.6% AND 25.5% HIGHER (BETWEEN 276 CENTS AND 285 CENTS PER SHARE) COMPARED TO 227 CENTS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
